name: Rebirth: From Chicken to Hero
description:
The Demon King was resurrected by his minion but everything didn’t turn out as planned. What happened? Why is there a chicken in the game? This is a short game created for the Indie Game Making Contest: Rebirth.

  • Play as 16 different type of characters
  • Redo style gameplay. Resurrect every time you die... with a twist
  • Short game. Roughly 1 hour
  • Finding the game too hard? A cheat option will pop up in the armory if you Resurrect more than 3 times.
